item.title: Book - Establishing SRE Foundations
item.description: related: [image](/obsidian/SRE]] [[Vladyslav Ukis) Establishing SRE Foundations Part I - Foundations Link to heading Chapter 1 - Introduction to SRE Link to heading Why SRE? Link to heading DevOps is an overarching philosophy for bringing product development and product operations together. SRE is a concrete opinionated implementation of the DevOps philosophy. Itil Link to heading Wikipedia defines ITIL as “A set pof detailed practices for IT service management that focus on aligning IT services with the needs of the business”
